sentences.en: I swept rainwater off the flat top of a gravestone.
sentences.cn: 我拂去一块墓碑平顶上的雨水。

sentences.en: Only a small amount of the rainwater actually infiltrates into the soil.
sentences.cn: 实际上只有少量雨水渗进了土壤。

sentences.en: The local limestone is so porous that all the rainwater immediately sinks below ground.
sentences.cn: 当地的石灰岩如此多孔以致所有的雨水很快渗到地下。
